description: This dataset contains annual hospital inpatient summary data based upon the Patient’s County of Residence.  The summary data includes discharge disposition, expected payer, sex, Medicare Severity-Diagnosis Related Group (MS-DRG), Major Diagnostic Categories (MDC), race group, admission source, and type of care.
keywords: department of health care access and information
name: hospital-inpatient-characteristics-by-patient-county-of-residence
related_resources: For facility-level data, see the “Hospital Inpatient Characteristics by Facility” dataset.

resources.description: This word document provides details about discharge disposition and  a note about MS-DRGs.
resources.name: hospital-inpatient-notes
resources.title: Hospital Inpatient - Notes

resources.description: This data table contains annual hospital inpatient summary data based upon the Patient’s County of Residence. The patient’s discharge disposition refers to where a patient is being discharged or transferred.
resources.name: hospital-inpatient-characteristics-disposition-by-patient-county-of-residence

sources.title: Hospital Inpatient Characteristics - Disposition by Patient County of Residence

resources.title: Hospital Inpatient Characteristics - Disposition by Patient County of Residence

resources.description: This data table contains annual hospital inpatient summary data based upon the Patient’s County of Residence. The expected payer is the entity or organization which is expected to pay or did pay the greatest share of the patient’s bill.
resources.name: hospital-inpatient-characteristics-expected-payer-by-patient-county-of-residence

sources.title: Hospital Inpatient Characteristics - Expected Payer by Patient County of Residence

resources.title: Hospital Inpatient Characteristics - Expected Payer by Patient County of Residence

resources.description: This data table contains annual hospital inpatient summary data based upon the Patient’s County of Residence. The patient’s sex is reported as male, female, other, or unknown
resources.name: hospital-inpatient-characteristics-sex-by-patient-county-of-residence

sources.title: Hospital Inpatient Characteristics - Sex by Patient County of Residence

resources.title: Hospital Inpatient Characteristics - Sex by Patient County of Residence

resources.description: This data table contains annual hospital inpatient summary data based upon the Patient’s County of Residence. The MS-DRG (Medicare Severity-Diagnosis Related Group) is a system used to classify a hospital inpatient stay into one of over 750 groups; each discharge record in the same MS-DRG is expected to have a similar hospital resource use. MS-DRGs are assigned based upon the principal diagnosis, additional diagnoses, procedures, sex and discharge status.
resources.name: hospital-inpatient-characteristics-ms-drg-by-patient-county-of-residence

sources.title: Hospital Inpatient Characteristics – MS-DRG by Patient County of Residence

resources.title: Hospital Inpatient Characteristics – MS-DRG by Patient County of Residence

resources.description: This data table contains annual hospital inpatient summary data based upon the Patient’s County of Residence. The Major Diagnostic Categories (MDC) are formed by dividing all possible principal diagnoses into 25 mutually exclusive diagnosis areas. The diagnoses in each MDC correspond to a single organ system or etiology and in general are associated with a particular medical specialty.
resources.name: hospital-inpatient-characteristics-mdc-by-patient-county-of-residence

sources.title: Hospital Inpatient Characteristics - MDC by Patient County of Residence

resources.title: Hospital Inpatient Characteristics - MDC by Patient County of Residence

resources.description: This data table contains annual hospital inpatient summary data based upon the Patient’s County of Residence. The Race Group is assigned based upon a combination of the Ethnicity and Race reported to HCAI.
resources.name: hospital-inpatient-characteristics-race-group-by-patient-county-of-residence

sources.title: Hospital Inpatient Characteristics – Race Group by Patient County of Residence

resources.title: Hospital Inpatient Characteristics – Race Group by Patient County of Residence

resources.description: This data table contains annual hospital inpatient summary data based upon the Patient’s County of Residence. The Admission Source is the site from which the patient originated.
resources.name: hospital-inpatient-characteristics-admission-source-by-patient-county-of-residence

sources.title: Hospital Inpatient Characteristics – Admission Source by Patient County of Residence

resources.title: Hospital Inpatient Characteristics – Admission Source by Patient County of Residence

resources.description: This data table contains annual hospital inpatient summary data based upon the Patient’s County of Residence. The type of care refers to the licensure of the bed occupied by an inpatient (acute care, skilled nursing/intermediate care, psychiatric care, chemical dependency recovery care, and physical rehabilitation care).
resources.name: hospital-inpatient-characteristics-type-of-care-by-patient-county-of-residence

sources.title: Hospital Inpatient Characteristics – Type of Care by Patient County of Residence
